plot: A dramatization inspired by the real-life events surrounding the recruitment and capture of Ahmed Ressam - aka the &"Millennium Bomber&". Ressam was convicted of smuggling a bomb into the United States as part of an Al Qaeda plot to blow up Los Angeles International Airport on New Year's Eve, 1999.   Written by  Anonymous
title: The Terrorist Next Door
